thread.title: Report: Falcons WR Jones (hamstring) uncertain for Week 6
thread.title_full: Report: Falcons WR Jones (hamstring) uncertain for Week 6

author: SI Wire
title: Report: Falcons WR Jones (hamstring) uncertain for Week 6
text:
Report: Falcons WR Jones (hamstring) uncertain for Week 6 Sports Illustrated 2 hrs ago SI Wire © Sports Illustrated atlanta-falcons-julio-jones-hamstring-injury-out Atlanta Falcons wide receiver Julio Jones could miss the team’s Week 6 matchup on Thursday night against the New Orleans Saints due to a lingering hamstring injury, reports ESPN’s Adam Schefter.
Jones, who played through the injury for 73 of Atlanta’s 80 offensive snaps in Sunday’s 25–19 overtime win against the Washington Redskins, did not practice on Monday. Jones finished the game with five catches for 67 yards, while also recovering a fumble in the end zone for a touchdown.
AdChoices During the week leading up to Sunday’s matchup, Jones had been listed as questionable with the hamstring injury, as well as a toe ailment.
Jones, 26, has been the leading receiver for the Falcons so far this season, hauling in 43 receptions for 545 yards and four touchdowns. He emerged as quarterback Matt Ryan ’s top target last year, catching 104 passes for 1,593 yards and six touchdowns.
The Falcons (5–0) will travel to New Orleans to face the Saints (1–4) at the Superdome on Thursday at 8:25 p.m. ET.
• Giants finally find fourth-quarter redemption in thrilling win over 49ers
- Kayla Lombardo
